org.softsmithy.lib.swing.customizer

Interface CustomizerBar

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JTabbedCustomizerBar, JTableCustomizerBar, JTreeCustomizerBar

    public interface CustomizerBar
    A CustomizerBar can be registered to a JCustomizerPane. It is a mechanism to add new customizers to the JCustomizerPane.
    Author:
    puce
